evidence.claim: BIVE.AI utilizes AWS for its cloud infrastructure.
BIVE.AI adheres to HIPAA regulations for health data handling.
BIVE.AI supports FHIR standard for health data interchange.
Integration with EHR systems via X12 transactions is enabled by BIVE.AI.
BIVE.AI employs RESTful APIs for data access and integrations.

icp.icp_reason: BIVE.AI focuses on HIPAA compliance and X12 EDI, indicating a strong fit for API-first healthcare integration.
